name: Fédération Européenne des Conseils et Intermédiaires Financiers
goal:
FECIF has been set up in 1999 to represent and defend the interest of the financial intermediaries in Europe.
Today FECIF represents more than 250,000 financial intermediaries (insurance & investment agents, brokers and consultants) across Europe.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: PRIIPS, MIFID2, IDD2, AEOFI, AIFMD, UCITS IV, Mortgage, Pension PEPPP
